outcome.title: Geometric Optimization
outcome.description: Sketch the feasible region of a linear optimization problem and identify the optimal solution geomtrically.

outcome.title: Simplex Pivots
outcome.description: Identify valid pivot positions in a tableau and be able to perform a simplex pivot.

outcome.title: Simplex Algorithm for Feasible Canonical Problems
outcome.description: Find the optimal solution for feasible canonical problem.

outcome.title: Unboundedness
outcome.description: Determine when a tableau indicates either an unbounded feasible region and/or unbounded objective function.

outcome.title: Simplex Algorithm for Unbounded Problems
outcome.description: Identify when the objective function for a linear optimization problem with unbounded feasible region still has an optimal solution.

outcome.title: Feasibility
outcome.description: Determine when a tableau indicates either an unbounded feasible region and/or unbounded objective function.

outcome.title: Simplex Algorithm for Infeasible Problems
outcome.description: Determine via the simplex algorithm whether a problem with infeasible basic solution has an empty feasible region or not.

outcome.title: Solving Linear Optimization Problems
outcome.description: Given a linear optimization problem, either solve it or determine if it is infeasible or unbounded.

outcome.title: Unconstrained Variables
outcome.description: Convert a noncanonical linear optimization problem with unconstrained variables into a canonical problem.

outcome.title: Equality Constraints
outcome.description: Convert a noncanonical linear optimization problem with equality constraints into a canonical problem.

outcome.title: Noncanonical Problems
outcome.description: Solve a noncanonical linear optimization problem.

outcome.title: Sensitivity Analysis
outcome.description: Find the change in the optimal solution of an objective function corresponding to changes in constraints.

outcome.title: Dual Tableau
outcome.description: Determine when a tableau indicates, infeasibility, unboundedness or optimality for the dual problem.

outcome.title: Dual Simplex Algorithm
outcome.description: Given a primal max problem, state the dual problem and use the simplex algorithm to solve it.

outcome.title: Solving Dual Problems
outcome.description: Given a primal max problem, state the dual problem and use the simplex algorithm to either find the optimal solution, or determine if the dual is infeasible or unbounded.

outcome.title: Noncanonical Dual Problems
outcome.description: Solve the dual problem to a noncanonical linear optimization problem.

outcome.title: Optimal Pure Strategies
outcome.description: Find the optimal strategy for both players for a zero sum game.

outcome.title: Optimal Mixed Strategies
outcome.description: Find the optimal mixed strategy for both players for a zero sum game.

outcome.title: Determining Payoff Matrices
outcome.description: Find the payoff matrix for a given game.

outcome.title: Games of Chance
outcome.description: Find the payoff matrix for a given game of chance.

outcome.title: Transportation Problem
outcome.description: Given a transportation problem, find the shipping schedule which minimizes shipping cost.

outcome.title: Transportation Modeling
outcome.description: FIXME

outcome.title: Assignment Problem
outcome.description: Given an assignment problem, find the assignment that minimizes cost.

outcome.title: Maximum Flow
outcome.description: Find a maximum flow through a capacitated network.

outcome.title: Minimum Cuts
outcome.description: Find a minimum of a capacitated network.

outcome.title: Shortest Paths
outcome.description: Apply Dijkstra's Shortest Path Algorithm.

outcome.title: Minimum Cost Flow
outcome.description: Apply the Minimum Cost Flow Algorithm.

outcome.title: Branch and Bound
outcome.description: Use the Branch and Bound Algorithm to solve an integer optimization problem.

outcome.title: Cutting Plane
outcome.description: Use the Gomory Cutting-Plane Algorithm Algorithm to solve an integer optimization problem.
